testsuite.name: 3login

testcase.name: LOGIN: User should get an error if fields are empty
LOGIN: User should get an error if username does not exist
LOGIN: User should get an error if email does not exist
LOGIN: User should get an error if password is incorrect
LOGIN: User should login with a correct user detail
